conclusion: A drives in from the lower right direction towards the group of blocks.
The scene contains a group of blocks of various colors: green, yellow, orange, red, blue, and purple.
Block positions are scattered, with some closer to A's trajectory from the lower right.
A first collides with the green cube.
After colliding with the green cube, A collides with the purple cube.
After colliding with the purple cube, A collides with the blue cube.
A continues to move out of the scene after colliding with the blue cube.
